title: GRANITES: PETROLOGY, STRUCTURE, GEOLOGICAL SETTING, AND METALLOG
description: Author: Anne Nedelec, Jean-Luc Bouchez, Peter Bowden Edition: 1 edition Publication Date: March 29, 2015 Publisher: Oxford University Press ISBN-10: 0198705611 ISBN-13: 978-0198705611 Pages: 352 pages Format: pdf Size: 11M --- This book - translated, edited, and updated from the original French edition Petrologie des Granites published by Vuibert in 2011 - gives a modern presentation of granitic rocks, or granites, from magma genesis to their emplacement into the crust and their crystallization. Mineralogical, petrological, physical, and economical aspects are developed in a succession of 14 chapters. Special `info boxes` discuss topics for those wishing to deepen their knowledge of the subject. Also included is a glossary, a comprehensive bibliography, as well as descriptions of modern techniques. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/granites-petrology-structure-geological-setting-and-metallogeny/

parsed.dn: GRANITES: PETROLOGY, STRUCTURE, GEOLOGICAL SETTING, AND METALLOG
parsed.name: GRANITES: PETROLOGY, STRUCTURE, GEOLOGICAL SETTING, AND METALLOG
